product_name: Taj Mahal Tea, 1kg: Amazon.in: Grocery & Gourmet Foods

reviews.review_title: Same packing Taj Tea with different rates like RS 550 and 445, 280 and 225, 140 and 115
reviews.review_body: There are two rates for 1 kg pack available in the market Rs 445 and Rs 550. The pack of 445 contains tea with leaf and it's taste is not like blue pack tea. But RS. 550 pack contains same tea like blue color pack without leaf and of a single color. I think manfacture of Taj Tea should made different packing of both the tea and they should not confuse the customer. If they want to charge higher rates for tea like previous one then charge but don't make foolish strategies by making same packing with different rate and different tea.

reviews.review_title: The quality of tea leaf is not good in this 1 kg pack in comparison to previous ...
reviews.review_body: The quality of tea leaf is not good in this 1 kg pack in comparison to previous buy as there is no herbs / flavour enhancer green tea. It was of black colour only.I was shocked and surprised thatHow such a reputed company pack/ sell two types of leaves in identical packings.
charged more than MRP. They have charged rs. 470  where as the MRP was 445.00

reviews.review_title: Old stock cleared With loose packing.
reviews.review_body: Product shuld have been vacuum packed but it is not.So no freshness, as you mentioned in description.You can check manufacturing or parking date. This is MAY 2019The very old stock has been cleared, I think this is cheating with costomer who shows faith and trust in you.
MRP mentioned on amazon.in is incorrecT. Have raised it with customer care as well but not action yet. Good product.

reviews.review_title: I like the complete blue pack
reviews.review_body: Taste is different than the other complete blue pack. It has some herbal leaves too. So kind of natural care version. I like the complete blue pack, that one is the best.

It's not what it looks and claimHere's why There are two rates for 1 kg pack available in the market Rs 445 and Rs 550. The pack of 445 contains tea with leaf and it's taste is not like blue pack tea. But RS. 550 pack contains same tea like blue color pack without leaf and of a single color. I think manfacture of Taj Tea should made different packing of both the tea and they should not confuse the customer. If they want to charge higher rates for tea like previous one then charge but don't make foolish strategies by making same packing with different rate and different tea.
Got the seal inside Amazon package opened with no vacuum in Golden pack
